name: Canvas play
tagline: The adventures of learning webGL one step at a time
body:
### Welcome to Canvas Play.
Follow along with me as I learn how to use WebGL, going from no knowledge with canvas to hopefully some more insight.

### First Time
This Will just be bare basics of drawing onto the web gl canvas, probably a square and a triangle

### Second Time
Getting a bit more complex I'll try to turn the square and triangle in to cube and pyramid.

#### Third Time
Even more complex add some rotations to both!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
